profile_summary:
As a proficient **Senior Python Software Engineer** with 8 years of experience, I bring extensive expertise in **Python**, **FastAPI**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **AWS**, driving high-performance solutions particularly in healthcare and financial sectors. My deep knowledge of **microservices** architecture and tools such as **REST**, **gRPC**, and **OpenAPI** forms the backbone of the scalable applications I develop. I leverage **CI/CD** practices, utilizing tools like **GitHub Actions**, and I am familiar with infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **CDK** for efficient deployment practices.

I also integrate cutting-edge concepts of **Machine Learning**, including **GenAI**, and I have hands-on experience with frameworks like **LangChain** and **LangGraph** to enhance application functionality. Throughout my career, I have successfully led teams in conducting thorough **code reviews** and implemented rigorous testing protocols to ensure quality and compliance with industry standards. My established track record in delivering enterprise-grade platforms is complemented by my proficiency in deploying applications aligned with regulations such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring robust security and reliability.
